meanings.sent1: I precomputed the total cost before going shopping.
meanings.sent2: The computer precomputed the results of the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The students precomputed the answers to the math test, but they were all wrong!
meanings.sent4: She precomputed her route to avoid traffic jams.
meanings.sent5: The chef precomputed the cooking time to ensure the meal was ready on time.

meanings.sent1: The precomputed values made the task much easier.

meanings.sent3: The precomputed decision was a relief for everyone involved.
meanings.sent4: Her precomputed plan was flawless and efficient.
meanings.sent5: The precomputed route led us straight to our destination without any detours.
